name: Seal of Solomon
shortDescription: The Ring of Power That Commanded Demons and Spirits
fullDescription:
The Ring of Power That Commanded Demons and Spirits The Seal of Solomon is a legendary magical ring or signet that granted King Solomon
                    power over demons, jinn, and spirits. According to various traditions, the ring was
                    given to Solomon directly by God (or through the archangel Michael) and bore either
                    the ineffable Name of God or a sacred geometric symbol, granting him wisdom and
                    authority over the supernatural world.
